title: Drawing, ca. 1805
medium: Pen and black ink, graphite, brush and wash on paper
markings: In purple ink, upper left: Cooper Union stamp: MUSEUM / FOR THE / ARTS OF / DECORATION / COOPER UNION (Lugt 457c)
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Two winged female figures, each on one knee flanking a vase and reaching to the hanging fruit.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, ca. 1805. Pen and black ink, graphite, brush and wash on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1195.
